alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:24AM EDT until March 25 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER TO RETURN THURSDAY AND FRIDAY... .A series of low pressure systems will affect the advisory area Thursday and Thursday night. The result will be a messy mix of rain, snow, sleet, and freezing rain. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to 3 inches and ice accumulations up to one quarter of an inch, and around one third of an inch between 1 and 3 thousand feet. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Carroll, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton, Southern Coos and Southern Grafton Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM Thursday to 5 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to icy roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton
